```{r}
#| label: getting the data
#| echo: true
#| message: false
#| cache: false

con <- dbConnect(duckdb(), shutdown = TRUE)
nyc <- tbl(con, "read_parquet('nyc-taxi-2024/*/*.parquet', hive_partitioning = true)")

nyc |> head(10) |> gt()

```

```{r}
#| label: cong-fee
#| code-fold: true


manhattan <- c(4, 12, 13, 24, 41, 42, 43, 45, 48, 50, 68, 74, 75, 79, 87, 88, 90, 100, 103, 107, 113, 114, 116, 120, 125, 127, 128, 137, 140, 141, 142, 143, 144, 148, 151, 152, 153, 158, 161, 162, 163, 164, 166, 170, 186, 194, 202, 209, 211, 224, 229, 230, 231, 232, 233, 234, 236, 237, 238, 239, 243, 244, 246, 249, 261, 262, 263)

nyc |> glimpse()
 

cong_fees <- nyc |>
  select(
    PULocationID, DOLocationID,
    tpep_pickup_datetime, tpep_dropoff_datetime,
    congestion_surcharge
  ) |>
  filter((PULocationID %in% manhattan | DOLocationID %in% manhattan) 
         & congestion_surcharge == 2.5
         & date(tpep_pickup_datetime) %in% c("2024-12-31", "2025-01-01")
         & date(tpep_dropoff_datetime) %in% c("2024-12-31", "2025-01-01")) |>
  mutate(
    type = case_when(
      PULocationID %in% manhattan ~ "out",
      DOLocationID %in% manhattan ~ "in"
    ),
    trip_time = case_when(
      type == "out" ~ tpep_pickup_datetime,
      type == "in"  ~ tpep_dropoff_datetime
    )
  ) |>
  collect()

#y = after_stat(count)

ggplot(
  data = cong_fees,
  aes(x=trip_time, group=type, fill=type)) +
  geom_density(adjust=1.5, alpha = 0.4) +
  scale_x_datetime(
  date_breaks = "4 hours",
  date_labels = "%H:%M"
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(
    title = "Entering and exiting the Manhattan on New Year's Eve based on congestion surcharge",
    x = "Time of trip",
    y = "Trip count",
    fill = "Type of trip"
  )

```
